UUIDv4Orv7.title: UUID (v4 or v7)
UUIDv4Orv7.description: Occurrence identity for operational logs and mutable timelines. Not verifiable by itself; do not treat as evidence identity.

IdempotencyKey.title: IdempotencyKey
IdempotencyKey.description: Caller-supplied key for dedupe of requests. Semantics are defined by the receiving system; treat as an opaque string.

Digest.title: Digest
Digest.description: Content-derived identifier computed from canonical bytes. Used for evidence identity and blob identity.

EventID.title: EventID
EventID.description: Verifiable event identity (content-derived digest of the canonical event envelope, domain-separated).

BlobDigest.title: BlobDigest
BlobDigest.description: Digest of raw bytes for a blob (file, object, artifact).

ContentRef.title: ContentRef
ContentRef.description: Pointer to external bytes by digest; used to bind receipts to real artifacts without embedding bytes.
